name: Sagittarius
desc: Power Core I holds the law of instant verdict and destruction, boosting the value of each fatal blow. After defeating it, your Crit DMG increases substantially in the final battle.

name: Idun the Unwithering Flower
desc: Power Core II is the original channel that supports Creator’s Will and provides full Creator's power. After defeating it, your Creator’s Will DMG increases substantially in the final battle.

name: Nemesis the Orderkeeper
desc: Power Core III is the pure form of holy energy, converting faith into a power of destruction. After defeating it, your H.DMG increases substantially in the final battle.

name: Anubis the Deathlord
desc: Power Core IV is the final judgement of power, deciding the limit of all damage output. After defeating it, your final DMG increases substantially in the final battle.

name: Pandora the Secretkeeper
desc: In the depth of the rift in this collapsing space, the lord of chaos awakens. It does not fight for destruction: it merely takes pleasure in disrupting the law of time. Countless shards of time and space stack into an endless trial. In the final battle, the winner no longer matters; survival is the only answer. Deal all the damage you can... while you can.
